data.name: Get The Substring
data.description:
Given a __partial__ string and a __whole__ string as input, you'll have to check if the partial string exists within the whole string. If found return 1/true, otherwise return 0/false.

### What To Check For:
1. partial >= 1 <= whole, otherwise return 0 / false
2. whole >= 1, otherwise return 0 / false


### Allowed Librarys
``` C
#include <stdlib.h>   /* for malloc and free */
#include <stdio.h>    /* for basic I/O operations */
#include <string.h>   /* for strlen and strcmp only */
```


#### Example:
    unsigned int substring("Hello", "Hello, world!") -->  1

    unsigned int substring(",", "Hello, world!")  -->  1
